summary: This module implements utilities for handling Metaflow's log entries. It defines parsers for log lines, supports conversion between byte and unicode representations, manages timestamps, and provides functions to merge, parse, and iterate over log streams. It also includes mechanisms to control whether logs should be persisted.
business_intent: Enable reliable collection, parsing, and consolidation of runtime logs within Metaflow workflows, facilitating debugging, monitoring, and optional persistence of execution details.
